title: Analytics Edge Add-ins and Connectors
description:
Looking for free Google Analytics reporting in Excel? Analytics Edge has it, but you get so much more for very little! Read on…
Generate professional custom reports on your own computer with Microsoft Excel. The Analytics Edge Add-in runs inside Excel to automate web analytics, SEO, PPC and email marketing reports. Features like quick queries, scheduled refresh, and wizard-based macros supplement Excel’s already powerful reporting capabilities. The simple automation add-in has connectors for popular services like Google Analytics, Facebook Ads and more.
